text.textblock: Grazing Administration_Exclusive of Alaska; Grazing Fee for the 1994 Grazing Year

action.textblock: Notice of establishment of grazing fee for the 1994 grazing year.

summary.textblock: The Secretary of the Interior hereby announces that the fee for livestock grazing for the 1994 grazing year is $1.98 per animal unit month on public lands administered by the Bureau of Land Management.

address.textblock: Any inquiries should be sent to: Director (220), Bureau of Land Management, Main Interior Bldg., rm. 5650, 1849 C Street, NW., Washington, DC 20240.

supplem.textblock: Grazing fees for the use of public rangelands are established and collected under the authority of section 3 of the Taylor Grazing Act of 1934, as amended (43 U.S.C. 315), and Executive Order 12548 of February 14, 1986. The grazing fees are computed by the formula established in 43 CFR 4130.7-1.

signjob.textblock: Assistant Secretary, Land and Minerals Management.
